required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of Trifluridine/ Tipiracil in Chemorefractory mCRC in Greece
clinical_study.official_title: A Retrospective Observational Study of Trifluridine/ Tipiracil (TAS-102) in Chemorefractory Metastatic Colorectal Cancer (mCRC) in Greece. Real World Data on Clinical Benefit.

lead_sponsor.agency: Hellenic Study Group of Psychoneuroimmunology in Cancer

clinical_study.source: Hellenic Study Group of Psychoneuroimmunology in Cancer

brief_summary.textblock: Collection of real world data on the clinical efficacy of trifluridine/ tipiracil (FTD/TPI) in the Greek population.

detailed_description.textblock: The aim of this analysis is to record clinical practice and to collect real world data on the clinical efficacy of trifluridine/ tipiracil (FTD/TPI) in the Greek population. Main objectives include to assess physician's choice of treatment in chemoresistant metastatic colorectal cancer with FTD/TPI in third line and beyond In addition, the clinicopathologic features related to metastatic colorectal cancer (focus on molecular profile), duration of treatment, dose modification and toxicity will be analyzed.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Retrospective data analysis from January 2018 to at least 3 months prior to being included in the study.
primary_outcome.description: PFS is defined as the time interval from initiation of treatment to the first date of documented tumor progression or death from any cause, whichever occurs first.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Retrospective data analysis from January 2018 to at least 3 months prior to being included in the study.
secondary_outcome.description: Overall survival is defined as the time interval from initiation of treatment to the date of death due to any cause.

secondary_outcome.measure: Progression Free Survival rate at 6 and 8 months
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Retrospective data analysis from January 2018 to at least 3 months prior to being included in the study.
secondary_outcome.description: PFS rate at 6 and 8 months corresponding to the percentage of patients surviving without any documented progression of the disease at 6 and 8 months after treatment initiation.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Retrospective data analysis from January 2018 to at least 3 months prior to being included in the study.
secondary_outcome.description: The DCR is defined as the proportion of patients with objective evidence of complete response (CR), the proportion of patients with objective evidence of partial response (PR), and the proportion of patients with objective evidence of stable disease (SD).

intervention.description: Trifluridine/ Tipiracil is an oral combination of an antineoplastic thymidine-based nucleoside analogue, trifluridine, and the thymidine phosphorylase (TPase) inhibitor, tipiracil hydrochloride.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Age > 18 years
- Histologically confirmed metastatic colorectal cancer
- Available data on previous chemotherapy lines
Exclusion Criteria:
No exclusion criteria have been established for this observational and retrospective study.

overall_official.affiliation: 4th Department of Internal Medicine, Attikon University Hospital

overall_contact.last_name: Anna Koumarianou MD, Consultant in Medical Oncology
